content:
This PR refactors the definition of light profinite sets to bring it closer to that of profinite sets. It becomes the category of totally disconnected second countable compact Hausdorff spaces. The old definition changes name to LightDiagram and we give an equivalence of categories.

These changes don't break anything currently in mathlib or in PRs about light condensed sets. Furthermore it makes a number of things easier, namely the construction of countable limits in LightProfinite and a discreteness characterisation for light condensed sets.

In the future, we might further refactor the definitions of CompHaus, Profinite, LightProfinite and Stonean to unify them in some sort of CompHausLike structure, but it's not quite clear how that would look exactly. In any case the refactor in this PR will make that future change cleaner. See this topic for more discussion
That diff is pretty hard to deal with on github :-( Not much you can do about that though!
The files Basic, Limits and EffectiveEpi correspond almost precisely to the ones in the Profinite directory FWIW. With the exception of the EssentiallySmall stuff at the bottom of Basic
